author: mark-grimes
body:
More details on #9958, just with the merge conflicts fixed.  Since I don't have direct access to the repository I can only merge complete PRs.

Also fixed some whitespace (tabs to spaces and column alignment).

I'm testing privately since it needs to be with #9946.

@boudoul
title: Fix merge conflicts in #9958 (HGCAL Descope in RunTheMatrix)
